text: Bradley Henry "Brad" Gerstenfeld (born April 14, 1960) is an American actor, stand-up comedian and professional poker player. He is known for his role as Robert Barone in Everybody Loves Raymond and for his movie roles in Stuart Little 2, Finding Nemo, Garfield, The Amateurs, The Pacifier, Night at the Museum, Tangled, A Bugs Life, Ratatouille, and Hoodwinked Too! Hood vs. Evil. He has won two Emmy Awards. Garrett was born on April 14, 1960 in Oxnard, California.Brad Garrett Biography (1960-) Garrett was married to Jill Diven from 1999 until they divorced in 2006.
